Munge GWAS summary statistics

Source: R/munge.R
munge.Rd

munge() applies 5 filters (if possible):

  1. Deduplication of RSID

  2. Filter variants on INFO in INFO column is present

  3. Filter variant on effect allele frequency

  4. Removes strand ambigious variants

  5. Removes variants with N < round(stats::quantile(step1$N, 0.9) / 1.5)

Usage

munge(dset, info_filter = 0.9, maf_filter = 0.01)

Arguments

dset

a dplyr::tibble() with columns SNP, A1 A2 Z N and optional columns EAF and INFO

info_filter

INFO score filter threshold at which to remove rows

maf_filter

Minor allele frequenc filter at which to remove rows

Value

a data.frame

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
parse_gwas(tbl)
} # }
